# CRAN Task View for ggplot2 Extensions

This repository is used to collaborate on the CRAN Task View for ggplot2 Extensions.
The goal of this task view is to provide a comprehensive list of packages that
extend ggplot2.

It is currently work in progress. See also:
https://github.com/ggplot2-extenders/ggplot-extension-club/discussions/82#
